: Information

# Ingredients

|             |                |              |
|:-----------:|:--------------:|:------------:|
| **Purpose** | **Ingredient** | **Quantity** |
|    Dough    |     Water      |     320g     |
|             |     Yeast      |     15g      |
|             |     Flour      |     500g     |
|             |      Salt      |     10g      |
|             |   Olive oil    |     50g      |

# Instructions

1.  Combine all ingredients.
2.  Knead.
3.  Cover and leave to rise for 30 minutes.
4.  Flatten with fingers and place in pan.
5.  Cover and leave to rise for 20 minutes
6.  Flatten with fingers.
7.  Leave to rise for 10 minutes
8.  Place covered in oven and fan-bake at 220 for 10 minutes (soft) or 15 minutes (crisp).
